attributes.action: To CHANGE to the Consumer Protection legislation in relation to new car sales to INCREASE  the period of time in which a customer can return a new car to a retailer AND  to WITHOLD a portion of the cost of the vehicle until the consumer is satisfied with the vehicle
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This relates to a realisation that problems related to a new vechile often take more than 14 days to come to light and once a consumer has fully paid for a vehicle they exert very little influence on the retailer in the event of a complaint.
